scripts.build: yarn gen-ver && yarn test && react-scripts build && yarn build:sw && cp src/version.json build && yarn tar
scripts.build:sw: rm -f build/asset-manifest.json build/static/js/*.js.map build/static/css/*.css.map build/service-worker.js build/precache-manifest.*.js && cd src/service-worker && node ./build.js && cd ../..
scripts.tar:
mkdir -p dist && rm -f dist/*.tgz && cd build && COPYFILE_DISABLE=1 tar cfz ../dist/${npm_package_name}-${npm_package_version}.tgz * && cd .. && echo '
*** DONE ***' && ls -1 dist
